name: examdb
description: A database of UK school examinations

scripts.deploy:prod: npm run test && npm run version:patch && npm run push && npm run launch
scripts.compile: npm run prettier && npm run compile:elasticbeanstalk
scripts.compile:elasticbeanstalk: mkdir -p build && git archive --format=zip HEAD > build/examdb-$npm_package_version.zip
scripts.pretest: npm run clean && npm run compile
scripts.push: npm run push:git && npm run push:heroku
scripts.push:elasticbeanstalk: echo 'build/exambd-$npm_package_version.zip' && echo 'push to AWS not implemented'
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:unit
scripts.changelog: LASTTAG=`git describe --tags --abbrev=0`; echo "======= Changes since last tag ($LASTTAG) ======="; git log $LASTTAG..HEAD --oneline

author: Ali Craigmile <ali@craigmile.com> (http://ali.craigmile.com)
